BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections
Comment: Continuation of the September 4, 2014 - Recessed Meeting

Items.Title: Continuation of the September 4, 2014 - Recessed Meeting

Communication from the Manhattan Borough President - Submitting the name of Anna Hayes Levin to the Council for its advice and consent regarding her reappointment to the City Planning Commission, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 192 of the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Anna Hayes Levin, City Planning Commission

Items.Title: Resolution amending Rule 7.00 of the Rules of the Council in relation to changes in Committee jurisdictions, the creation of a new Committee, Chair and Membership, deletion of a subcommittee and allowances.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Changes in Committee jurisdictions, the creation of a new Committee, Chair and Membership, deletion of a subcommittee and allowances.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
